text: Winter Wonderland is the eleventh album by Contemporary Christian group Point of Grace and their second Christmas album, after 1999's A Christmas Story. It was released in 2005 by Word Records. ==Track listing== # "It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year" (Edward Pola; George Wyle) - 2:52 # "Winter Wonderland" (Dick Smith; Felix Bernard) - 3:14 # "Let There Be Light" featuring John David Webster (Marie Reynolds; Scott Krippayne) - 4:42 # "Jingle Bells" (James Lord Pierpont) - 5:10 # "Breath of Heaven (Mary's Song)" (Amy Grant; Chris Eaton) - 5:41 # "In the First Light" (Robert John Kauflin) - 3:34 # "Santa Medley" (Gene Autry; Johnny Marks; Oakley Haldeman; Steve Nelson; Walter Rollins) - 5:01 #*"Here Comes Santa Claus" (Gene Autry and Oakley Haldeman) #*"Frosty the Snowman" (Jack Rollins and Steve Nelson) #*"Rudolph, the Red-Nosed Reindeer" (Johnny Marks) # "Little Town" (Phillips Brooks; Lewis H. Redner; Chris Eaton) - 4:06 # "For Unto Us" (George Frederick Handel) - 4:48 # "All Is Well" featuring Michael W. Smith (Michael W. Smith; Wayne Kirkpatrick) - 4:21 ==Singers== * Shelley Breen * Heather Payne * Denise Jones * Leigh Cappillino ==References== Category:Point of Grace albums Category:2005 Christmas albums Category:Christmas albums by American artists
title: Winter Wonderland (Point of Grace album)
